document.docAuthor: Proshchalykin, Maxim Yu. & Lelej, Arkady S.
document.masterDocTitle: Review of the genus Ammobatoides Radoszkowski, 1867 (Hymenoptera: Apidae, Nomadinae) from Russia and neighbouring countries

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of the genus Ammobatoides Radoszkowski, 1867 (Hymenoptera: Apidae, Nomadinae) from Russia and neighbouring countries

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Phileremus abdominalis
Eversmann 1852
: 88
, ♀ ( type locality: «in prov. Orenburgensi, in promontoriis Uralensibus», Russia , South Ural);
Smith 1854
: 254
.

Phileremus hirsutilus
Eversmann 1852
: 89
, ♂, ( type locality: «in promontoriis Uralensibus australibus et in terris transuralensibus», Russia , South Ural). Synonymized by
Radoszkowski 1867
: 82
.

Ammobates extraneus
Förster 1855
: 253
–256 ( type locality: Turkey ). Synonymized by
Dalla Torre 1891
: 157
.

Ammobates rufitarsis
Smith 1879
: 101
, ♀ ( type locality: Siberia). Type in British Museum, London Great Britain . Synonymized by
Popov 1936
: 159
.

Phiarus abdominalis
var. sanguineus
Friese 1911
: 141
, ♂ (holotype—♂, Sarakhs, Turkmenistan ,
22 .VI
). Type in ZMHB . Synonymized by
Warncke 1982
: 116

Phiarus abdominalis
var. rufus
Friese 1911
: l 42 , ♀ (holotype—♀, Erevan, Armenia ). Type in ZMHB . Synonymized by
Warncke 1982
: 116
.

Phiarus angarensis
Cockerell 1928
: 345
(holotype—♂, Ust-Balei, on the Angara River, Siberia,
July 1927
, T. Cockerell). Synonymized by
Schwarz et al. 1996
: 168
.

Ammobatoides abdominalis
ssp. marchicus
Bischoff 1952
: 61
–62, ♀, ♂ (holotype—♀, Germany ). Type in ZMHB . Synonymized by
Warncke 1982
: 116
.

Ammobatoides lebanensis
Mavromoustakis 1959
: 33
–34, ♀, ♂ (holotype—♀, Brumana, Lebanon ). Type in Cyprus Museum, Nikosia. Synonymized by
Warncke 1982
: 116
.

Ammobatoides abdominalis
var. rufa :
Popov 1934
: 67
; 1967 b: 209 .
